subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Jim Furyk ended his longest drought since he joined the PGA Tour, closing with a two-under-par 69 for a one-shot victory in the Transitions Championship in Palm Harbor, Fla.
snippet: Jim Furyk ended his longest drought since he joined the PGA Tour, closing with a two-under-par 69 for a one-shot victory in the Transitions Championship in Palm Harbor, Fla.
